addfuel.AddFuel_Fuel_container: Select your fuel name from the dropdown.

addfuel.AddFuel_StateId_container: Select your state from the dropdown.
addfuel.AddFuel_CityId_container: Select your city from the dropdown.
addfuel.AddFuel_EffectiveDate: Select your effective date from the calendar.
addfuel.AddFuel_AddData: Click here to add more data in the table.
